problem.title: CheckPoint: Massive Pulley
problem.script:
from __future__ import division from loncapa import *
a=lc_random(1,3,1) b=lc_random(1,3,1) c=lc_random(1,3,1) d=lc_random(1,3,1) e=lc_random(1,3,1) m=lc_choose(a,0.5,1.2,2.5) r=lc_choose(b,0.15,0.20,0.24) M=lc_choose(c,0.8,1.4,1.9)
ans=(2* M/( m + 2* M))*(9.8/ r)
problem.p: A uniform solid disc of mass $m kg and radius $r m is free to rotate on a horizontal frictionless axle passing through the center of the disc. A long light string is wrapped around the disc; a block of mass $M kg is suspended on the string as shown. The system is released from rest, and the block begins to descend. Find the angular acceleration \(\alpha\) of the disc. Enter your answer in rad/s2 and use g = 9.8 m/\(s^{2}\).
